name: Jimin Park
headline: Data Scientist & Machine Learning Engineer
Passionate about Deep Learning, Model Optimization, and Real-world Impact
biography: Master's student in Computer Science at Georgia Tech specializing in Machine Learning. With experience in both research and industry, I've worked on optimizing TinyML models, time-series forecasting, and building scalable ML pipelines. Previously, I contributed to national R&D strategies through data-driven policy research at KIST and KIPF. I'm passionate about building interpretable, efficient, and impactful machine learning systems.

experience.title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
bullets: Processed 5M+ Web of Science records with PySpark & SQL, boosting Top-1% journal recall to 92% (+9 pp) and cutting literature triage by 49%
Shipped CI/CD dashboards on 12 OECD datasets that forecasted research KPIs and informed Korea's 5-year R&D roadmap
First-author presenter at Society for Engineering & Technology Management; mined 60 expert interviews via NLP topic modeling to surface policy gaps

experience.company: KISTEP (Korea Institute of Science & Technology Evaluation and Planning)
experience.title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
bullets: Automated AHP scoring ETL, slashing review turnaround from 3 weeks → 3 days (-90%) and improving budget allocation accuracy by 12%
Built a feature store with weekly retraining pipelines, delivering reproducible economic-risk models and versioned artifacts in AWS QuickSight

experience.title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
bullets: Unified 150+ global policy datasets via Python/SQL ETL, saving 200+ analyst hours and producing features for large-scale feasibility models

experience.company: KIET (Korea Institute for Industrial Economics & Trade)
experience.title: Data Scientist / ML Engineer intern
bullets: Owned the ISTANS platform—kept 99.9% uptime and ran nightly ETL that pulled 1M+ new records spanning 50+ industrial KPIs
Automated 'Industrial Key Indicators' dashboards with Python + SQL, cutting data-publish latency 4h → 30min (-87%) and giving analysts near-real-time trend views

Built a news text-mining & forecasting pipeline (KoNLPy, gensim, LSTM) processing 20K+ articles/day to generate sector sentiment and one-month IPI forecasts (MAPE 3.2%) cited in quarterly policy briefs
